name: Gamehunt
description:
Gamehunt - A game where you play as a rabbit - "Tom", your goal is to go through a lot of difficult levels and get to his beloved rabbit. The game features 10 unique and challenging levels, try to pass all and get the most valuable gift.

In this game you have to collect coins and pass the levels.

The game features:
- 10 challenging levels;
- Beautiful animated landscapes;
- Good soundtracks.
